mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REQUST_ID , CALL_CLASS_ID , INF_CLASS_ID , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , ORD_NO , CLM_NO , INPUT_CONT , OUTPT_CONT , INF_ERR_CD_CONT , EXECUT_BEG_DT , EXECUT_END_DT , ELAPSE_TIME , INF_HIST_STAT_CD , MSG_CONT FROM INF_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQUST_ID = #{requstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM INF_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQUST_ID = #{requstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
